tasks.instruction:
Improve the website for Tawin, a premium tech company competing with Microsoft and Apple. Make the following specific changes to the home screen:
1. Make the main body description font size smaller
2. Lower the position of the two buttons at the bottom
3. Space everything out evenly
4. Remove the dark filter on the PNG background if possible
5. Add improvements to make the website look as grand/premium as possible

Working directory: /workspace/shadcn-ui/src
Current technology: HTML and CSS
